description: A massive industrial facility within Punk Hazard containing an enormous tank labeled 'SAD'. This room is the center of Caesar Clown's artificial Devil Fruit production, manufacturing the key substance needed to create SMILE fruits for Kaido.

keyEvents.title: Law Enters the SAD Production Room
keyEvents.description: Trafalgar Law successfully infiltrates Section D and enters the SAD production facility, achieving his primary objective.
keyEvents.significance: This marks the key location where Law executes his plan to disrupt Doflamingo and Caesar's operations.

statusHistory.description: SAD production facility operational under Caesar's control

significance: Critical location for the production of SAD, the base material for artificial Devil Fruits. Controlling or destroying this facility is central to Law's plan to disrupt the supply chain to Kaido.
trivia: SAD stands for the substance used to create SMILE artificial Devil Fruits
The room contains a giant tank that stores the SAD substance

description: The royal palace of Dressrosa where Donquixote Doflamingo resides as the king. The palace features outdoor areas with chairs where Doflamingo conducts business with his crew members.

keyEvents.title: Doflamingo's Major Scene at Dressrosa
keyEvents.description: Doflamingo is shown at his palace surrounded by his crew members, receiving reports from Vergo and issuing orders.
keyEvents.significance: First major appearance of Doflamingo's base of operations and reveals the extent of his criminal organization.

statusHistory.description: Palace under Doflamingo's control as King of Dressrosa

significance: Serves as the headquarters for the Donquixote Pirates and the seat of power for Doflamingo's control over Dressrosa. This location becomes central to the Dressrosa Arc.
trivia: The palace is where Doflamingo conducts his business as both king and underworld broker
Multiple officers of the Donquixote Pirates reside at or frequent the palace
